title: How to Do a Comb-Over | AXE | Instagroom
description:
Luke likes his hair smart. He combs it over like this.

THE TOOLS:
AXE Signature Clean Cut Look Classic Pomade 
Comb 

THE STEPS:
1. Blow-dry hyperlink to blow-dry tutorial
2. Mix scoop of pomade
3. Run through hair
4. Comb over

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: Yeah, my hair has got a mind of its own, but I do like it smart. So I dry my hair, take a bit of pomade, because my hair is quite thick, and then mix it in my hands, and then run it through my hair. And then comb it to the side to finish it off. Looks smart when I’ve finished it, yeah.
